Reviews.Title: just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: weizel
Reviews.Content: This phone is simple, sleek, very light weight, and works perfectly! I bought it because I was downgrading to save money and I actually love it more than my "smartphone" that took FOREVER to boot and make phone calls. I use this new phone for texting and calls and it's simple and efficient. Someday when I can afford an iPhone I'll make the change but this works for every need I have at this moment!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: subash bista
Reviews.Content: i just want to make & receive calls til my next contract. This phone helped me to do so without any problem.

Reviews.Title: O yeah! Worth every dime
Reviews.Author: AmirahRenee'
Reviews.Content: This phone came and it's great! Came way before in expected which is great! No scratches clean ID just great! My grandad loves it!!! This comapny is great! Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: Mike in Lexington
Reviews.Content: It is what we ordered. It is a nice little old flip phone. It surely fits our needs just fine.

Reviews.Title: this phone sucks
Reviews.Author: steve foster
Reviews.Content: It's very generic. The earpiece is either to loud or to soft and there's no camera.I should have just spent the extra$20 and got the LG phone. Im definitely not a big fan of this phone..

Reviews.Content: The batery is not good this product is thif not good no like no more bay this pepol no moore
